feed.title: Hoodik Releases

entry.title: New release for Hoodik: Release v1.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: broken postgres directory listing by @htunlogic in https://github.com/hudikhq/hoodik/pull/100
  • Release v1.2.1 by @htunlogic in https://github.com/hudikhq/hoodik/pull/101

Full Changelog: https://github.com/hudikhq/hoodik/compare/v1.2.0...v1.2.1

entry.title: New release for Hoodik: v1.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature/build process by @htunlogic in https://github.com/hudikhq/hoodik/pull/117
